task.title: View Your Personal Information
task.shortdesc: Access and view your personal information in MyPack Portal.

step.cmd: Click on the Personal Information tile.

taskbody.result:
You can now view and update your personal information, including:
Personal Details (Student ID number, Name and Preferred Name)
Contact Details (Email addresses, phone numbers)
Addresses
Emergency Contacts
Text/Email Notification Setup
Ethnicity
Privacy Restrictions
Residency
Veterans Information
OIS Compliance Verification (for International students only)
Provide Social Security Number
Parent & Guardian Access
